description: Surface Transport panel meeting documents from 2016 and earlier covering topics such as pedestrian countdown, freight, taxis and cycling

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Before committees and panels were reorganised in 2016, the Surface Transport panel considered wide-ranging issues including policy, strategy, the implementation of the Mayor's Transport Strategy and operating business performance in relation to TfL's Surface Transport services."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
